title: When the internet goes really slow, e.g 200+ ms, what should we do in game?
body: Disconnect is the only way, coz bad connection ruins ur in game experiment, even if u want to fix this problem, u still have to disconnet the game for a while. But this will lead u into the AFK punishment which means 5 Low priority queue for 2 mins, 100 mins waiting for a game is unacceptable. I hope Riot can learn from Dota2, if ur internet goes really bad, u r free to leave the game.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: If I understand correctly, you're having some really high ping that reconnecting can sometimes fix.  Your network might be unstable and suffering from something like packet loss with our game server.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an analysis of your case.  Let me know the results!
